content.detailedDescription: I was driving home one night from work at about 12am.  i turned into my culdasac and i noticed something almost hanging from the house accross the street.  it was a triangle shaped object flying very low in the sky.  literally i felt like i could touch it.  i thought maybe it was a helicopter looking for someone.  but i opened my truck window to hear it. and there was no sound.  it was flying very slow above the house, inching along.  i thought it was really weird because there was no sound coming from it and it was flying so low.  it could have touched the houses if it was any lower.  i watched the object continue to move from house to house.  and then i got nervous and went into my house.  i never told anyone about it until my co-worker told me that he saw this weird thing in the sky on the way home.  and i proceeded to explain it to him and he was freakin out.  he hadn't told anyone either and i described it just the way he saw it.  but like i said, he said that there was no sound coming from it. it was very strange that we both saw it on different nights, but saw the same thing.
content.summary: Something flying really low over the houses in my neighborhood, no sound

content.detailedDescription: While enjoying my telescope in the backyard with my daughter we witnessed what i thought was the international space station going overhead. but the object stopped for approximately 10 mins. then it faded away.(many people in this area have witnessed strange objects during the spring of that year.I know of two people who have video of this and one making it to the northern daily news,(our local newspaper).I'm sure there are many more that have seen this around this area during that time period.
content.summary: Brighter than a satelite moving slowly then stopping for 10 mins.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the nasa channel.. i believe it was around 7am phx time 6th 2005 sat. morning. i was watching what i think was a camera on earth pointing at the dark side of some continent ,at night.
you could see city lights, not moving of course because you can't see city lights move from that hight right?

one light appeared  moving on the screen from right to left then stopped , and change direction 60deg.Ne.
i am not sure if it stopped when the other light showed up on the right side of screen .
thelight moved accross a country in less than 7 sec.
what moves that fast?
and id it was not as close to earth as it looked it 
would still be way up.
oh the camera shut off at tht point and was not seen again
in that direction.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo on nasa  channel aug 6th 2005

content.detailedDescription: my dad and i were walking up from the barn after doing chores. we had gotten right outside of our driveway when my dad said he had to go check on the animals in the upper pasture. several minutes later i observed an oval orange neon craft rise from behind the hill across our road. i thought it was a ufo immediately. it was nothing i had ever seen before and my gut said that it was not of this earth. its possible it could be some govt. vehicle but my intuition said no. i would say it was two football fields away. approximately three seconds later it was hovering over the road about 3 to 4 feet above road from the south. it had a gaseous auora. it was about 12 feet high and it took up the entire diameter of the road. i would say 25 feet wide. it had windows in the middle of the front like portholes on a cruise ship. it did not make any noise and there was no sign of propelsion mechanism. it just hovered for 3 to 4 minutes and then sped off at lightning speeds through the trees in a southwesterly direction and quickly disappeared. during this event i was in total awe. i was only ten years old. i felt like somewhat paralyzed. i wanted to run but i was in too much shock. after it sped away i ran as fast back to the house as i could. that was probably only 60 yards. a few days later i started having strange nightmares of ufo's and i remember a presence in my room and feeling paralyzed.
content.summary: I witnessed an oval orange neon craft rise above our hill across the road and in a matter of seconds watched it hover over the road for approx 3-4 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was outside my apartment complex walking my dog.

2. what made you first notice the object?

there was a bright light in the sky that got my attention.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

an extremely bright star.  or a plane.

4. describe the object and its actions.

it was a bright green light.  somewhat like a star, but brighter, much larger, and with a more green hue.  i saw it i had only a second to take a closer look, then it shot off.  it went from there to left (almost due north).  it would have taken a plane about a minute or so to cover this much distance (35-30 degrees)  this thing did it in about 3/4 to 1/2 a second.  not as fast as a meteor or comet, but far faster then a plane.  it went where a tree obstructed my view, and i could no longer see it, it was goign fast, and i assume it did not stop behind the tree.  it took me a second to think, but i could not get around the trees to see.

5. describe your reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

at first, i thought it was a shooting star, or a plane or something.  then i was kind of shocked.  no plane could go that fast, and a shooting star would be faster, and not as bright and close.  i then started to think, this is pretty weird.  i looked around hoping someone was out side as well.  but noone was, so i walked over and opened my car door to take a look at the time.  it was 10:38 give or take one minute that this happend, pacific time.  i then watched the sky, hoping i could see something, kinda doubting i would, and nothing came.  i continued to walk my dog, thought about it, and tryed to figure out what it could be.  then came in my house.

6. how did you lose sight of the object? 

as i said, when it flew off, it went where a tree blocked my view.
content.summary: A large green light, similar to a stars light, but much brighter and greener.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
1) we were driving northbound on hwy 101 just entering rohnert park from the cotati grade.

2. what made you first notice the object?
2) my wife said half jokingly, "look, aliens!" i was driving and looked towards where she pointed and saw four bright, glowing objects.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
3) i did not have any thought specifically yet as to "what" these objects were other than, "wow, that's really strange" and that they did not seem to be conventional aircraft.

4. describe the object and its actions.
4) the objects were glowing very brightly, were sphere like, varying in their intensity, flying side-by-side but varying their altitude and brightness with respect to one another slightly.  they seemed to be moving away from us as over the approximate 7 minutes we observed them they seemed to get smaller as if moving into the distance.  while watching them i tried to think what they might be, that maybe they were airplanes reflecting the sun, but they were just sperical and the light coming from them was not like a reflection.  it seemed to be generated from the objects and varied in intensity as they varied their attitudes position wise towards each other.

5. describe your reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
5) this wasn't my first sighting and i tend to take these things sort of for granted, so i was kind of like "wow, that's really strange" but being that i've had several experiences with these things it was almost kind of like just another sighting.  i was was more analytically thinking of it more so than being excited about the event.  during the sighting i was a little excited as this was my first daylight sighting.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
6) the objects seemed to move away from us, nnw, at first slowly, then suddenly disappeared all together.
content.summary: 4 bright, glowing objects flying nnw away from santa rosa

content.detailedDescription: A flying saucer flew over my school, cliftonville boy's school in the summer of 1953.  we were at recess and my instructer mr. olsen was standing by my side.  we were standing in front of the school looking accross our soccer field.  we saw a saucer shaped disc appear above the trees at the edge of the school grounds.  it flew in a straight line directly over the school.  the sky was clear and it was easy to see.  the saucer was fairly flat and it appeared to be metallic.  in the center of the saucer was a dome which was maybe 1/6th the size of the saucer and 4 times higher than the thickness of the saucer.  the dome had a hat band around it approximately 1/2 the hight of the dome.  the hat band had black circles the full height of the band and touching one another.  these black circles went entirely around the dome.  the area around the black circles was either bluish grey or mauve.  the top of the dome was eighter bluish grey of mauve also.  the top of the dome was one color and the hat band was the other color.  the saucer was rotating in a clockwise direction.  the black circles moves slowly around the dome as the saucer flew over.  the saucer seemed to be flying fairly high, maybe 20,000 feet.  even though it flew this high it was still possible to see the black circles around the dome.  there was no sound and the saucer flew over in 8-10 seconds.
content.summary: Saucer shaped disc w/dome w/black circles on dome
4 fighter were doing manuvers where they were circling. way up above them were several dots moving at high speeds, changing speeds and moving strangely.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on i-95 right around the savanah, georgia airport. i saw a faint light moving across the sky over the highway in the distance out of the corner of my eye.  at first i thought it was a satellite but it was moving quite rapidly. it made its way across the highway and then came to a complete stop for a few seconds and then went in the opposite direction just as fast as the first time and then came to another complete stop and hovered there until i drove past and couldn't see it anymore.  i thought at first it could be an airplane but what type of an airplane comes to a complete stop in midair and sits there.  then i thought maybe it was a helicopter but it was flying at a very high altitude and quit fast for a helicopter and a helicopter usually flys lower to the ground and you can usually tell its a helicopter by the brighter solid light and slower speed.
content.summary: Saw a faint light moving rapidly across the sky to small for both an airplane or helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: About 6:00pm on the afternoon of august 26, 2003, i took my dogs in the back yard. i heard a small plance low and close.  i looked up as the plane came over the trees.  at this time i heard another small plane.  i walked to the edge of the porce and looked over the roof at the plane.  as i looked at the second plane, i noticed a shiney object shaped like cylinders.  there were two cylinders.  they were even in length and size and there appeared to be space between them.  from my view, it looked as if they may have been connected by something that was not as long as the two cylinders and from my point of view, the center conenction was darker.  the cylinders were at a banked angle which made the center connection unclear.  as i watched for approximately 20 seconds, there was a burst of a very bright light as from a flood light.  the bright light was about the size of a quarter at arms length and the two cylinders were 1" to 1 1/4" aal.  after the flash, the craft continued on until out of sight.  it was lower and slower than a commercial arliner.  the object was going south west.
content.summary: Cigar/cylindrical object flying over house

content.detailedDescription:
Sat, july 30, 2k5/ 
          i was walking east on dundas ave to the intersection of dundas and ossington to catch a bus. a kid on a bike was stopped on the side walk and was staring up at something, i asked him what he was looking at and he pointed out three objects in the clear blue sky, the weather conditions were perfect,not a cloud in the sky,temp,was 26 degrees cel. wind blowing off the lake from south to north at aprox. four to five mph. the first thing i thought was stray baloons from the carabana celeberations, but they weren't drifting,then i thought they were hand gliders, but they seemed too high,and they were not seagulls either,causr the birds move in their flight these objects did not, at first. when i first saw them they were in a triangle formation, then after a few more momentes, they changed formation to resemble the belt of orion, placed as it would be in the night sky in the fall, i think. then after what seemed like one or two miniutes, they resumed the triangle shape and remained stationary for at least thirty to fourty miniutes. during this time an airbus a320 passed over head and the size of the plane was equivilant to my thumbnail in perspective.The airplane blocked one of the lights from view as it passed for a split second. that made me think that these were not balloons or hanggliders. i rode my bus to ossington station,and looked again to see if they were still there, and they were, in the same possition. i made my payment and pointed the lights out to two people who work at the store and they watched for five more minutes,aprox. the objects began to drift or move off to the south,then they faided from sight, later that day i saw a lone balloon moving across the sky from south to north and you could tell it was a balloon by the way it moved in the wind.
  i was not in possetion of a camera of any kind, but i am curious as to know if anybody else can independently conferm what i saw.
                        regards gord eckstein
                        email gordx@lycos.Com
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw  three bright lights in triangle formation over toronto city center in broad daylight, lights changed formation then resumed triangle formation objects remained stationary in windy conditions for thirty-five to fourty min.

content.detailedDescription: In my backyard i was watching some weird clouds with my wife.I thought it was a plane but noticed it wasnt moving. my wife walked into the house i was still ouside and decided to get the video camera. i told her to come back outside with me and watch it.It stayed in the same spot blinking for at least 5 or 6 minutes. i was really surprised because i am a skeptic and dont believe in extraterrestrials.The object just stopped blinking and i got it on tape. i  don't have the ability to transfer the tape to my computer so i cannot attatch it.Sorry.
content.summary: Blinking light in eastern sky that did not move

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down nine mile towards graiot and a strange light caught my eye.At first i thought maybe it was a helicopter or a air plane but it had no flashing lights.
it looked like a glowing blimp shaped object slowly moving east. i just stared at it trying to figure what it was.I
went to a friend house to show them they all went outside and couldnt explain what it was either.We followed it down the street on foot until it went behind trees in the distance
and we lost track of it.The night was a clear night.
content.summary: A glowing pulsating cigar shaped light moving slowly east

content.detailedDescription:
In july of 1998 my mother went on a trip to south africa. while en route she took several photos from the plane of different things (ocean, sky, etc). after she returned and the photos were developed i noticed a small brownish disk-shaped object on one of them. she swears she never saw the object while she was taking the pictures.I scanned the picture onto my computer and enlarged it. unfortunately the enlarged photo is blurred because the object is so small. one of the odd things about it is that the ufo appears to be surrounded by some kind of "halo". attached is the original photo and two enlargements. i apologize for not being able to highlight the object in the main picture (it is in the upper-left quadrant). on one of the enlargements i have adjusted the brightness and contrast to make the halo more visible. any help you can offer in identifying the unknown object will be greatly appreciated.

thank you.
content.summary: Disk w/ halo

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking down a path by my home. i looked up and saw this light it was perfectly round about the size of a large plate. it decended towards me about a mile away or closer.
at a 45 degree angle when it reached some trees it shot up 
and with in a second it was the size of a star and disapeard
i told me wife to look but it was so fast she did not see it .
content.summary: round light size of the moon when first sighted decended towards me.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer when i heard some people shouting outside saying"look up in they sky!"i looked and i saw the ufo i knew the ufo was of course something like a ufo because ive read many books about them ,the ufo looked like a air plane crashing side way in a rainbow of colors , after about 10 mins. it reared back up and diappered out of thin air
content.summary: Like a air plane crashing sideways and rainbow colors

content.detailedDescription:
My mother told me that while travelling on rt 84 near the exit for rt 52, all the cars on the highway stopped to look at the object in the sky. she described it as the size of a football field, rectangular in shape and also said the center was hollow(for lack of a better word) in other words, one could see through the center and see the stars in the sky. she said it just stayed above them making no sound whatsoever. not moving at all,just suspended in mid air for about 10 minutes or so. then left the area without making any noise. 
the following day, a friend of hers that worked for the phone company told her that they had been swamped with calls -thousands of them. of people trying to find out where they can call to report seeing this object. 
she says i was in the car at the time, but i have no recollection of this. 
she also said the oddest part about it was that all these people on the highway got out of their cars but no one said a word to each other. no one commented on it it was eerie and dead silent. she even said she and my step father got back in the car and drove away after it left and they didn't speak to each other either. 
i have been trying to find other reports on this same sighting. just out of curiosity. 
weird.
content.summary: Rectangular hovering ship?

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving with my friend in the middle of the night through the woods on route 101 in oregon, heading south. it was probably about midnight, very dark out, we haven't seen many other cars, there are no lights above the road. in the side mirror i saw a blinking yellow light hovering and following behind us. i was about to say something to my friend when he said, "are you seeing this?" and i said, yes, what is it? it followed us for maybe thirty seconds, while we were kind of dumbfounded, and if my memory serves me, i think it matched our speed as we sped up and slowed down, but that may be a false conception. during this period i looked up to my left and saw around the top of a tree another yellow light. it was about as high as the top of power lines would be. i did not see it for very long, as we passed by quickly, so my impression of this light is less ingrained. the one behind us just dissapeared. right after it stopped blinking, i realized that the radio had been giving off static noise in time with the blinking. the radio had been off the whole time. i wonder if this might have been my imagination, because i should have noticed the radio noise earlier, however, i might have been too distracted wondering what the lights were to notice the radio earlier. 
 i realize that a blinking yellow light behind a car sounds a lot like it might be another car's turn signal, but the conditions make this possibilty seem improbable. we were drinving in a dark area, not near a city, no road lights. it was dark. i have tried to turn out my lights and drive for a few seconds while on dark camp roads, and you can't see anything. you can't turn out your headlights for more than 3 seconds or so, and you can't go more than about 5 miles an hour. the darkness on 101 was like this. i find it hard to believe that someone was drinving a car for at least a minute or two without headlights, travelling at 45 or 50 miles an hour behind us. even if they were just following the lights on our car, how did they catch up to our car in the first place? the light just came out of nowhere. no headlights, and i don't think i had seen anyone behind us for a while.
 i was wondering if you get anything similar, or if you have an explanation.
content.summary: Blinking yellow light behind car and another one above tree, corresponding to radio fuzz

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were walking home from the bus stop at about 9:30 at night. to our left (south of us), we noticed a yellow light. it looked like a large yellow planet, although it was slightly larger than a large star or planet. we thought it was just a star or planet, because it was going the same speed as us and appeared to not be moving. but as soon as we stopped, it kept continuing on, so we could tell it was moving. so we kept an eye on it, and sure enough, as soon as we started walking, it appeared to not be moving. all of a sudden, it dissappeared, and reappeared in front of us (to the north). it was slightly larger. it wasn't blinking, like a plane or helicopter does. we could also compare it to an airplane, because in the distance, to the south of the object, we could see two airplanes. it moved to the right (south)for a little bit, then it stopped. all of a sudden, it just dissappeared completely.
content.summary: It was a yellow light, moving slowly in the sky, dissappearing and reappering once

content.detailedDescription:
1. approximately 1942 to 1944 people were afraid to go out at night because of rumors "that doctors in green suits with large sunglasses were going around in vehicles kidnapping people and experimenting on them".
i believe that at the time people had no idea of ufo's or aliens so that what they were describing was put in terms of what was logical.
i was a young boy at the time.  my brother who is 2 years older than i remembers also,
have you received reports like this from others?
thank you
edward kluckowski
content.summary: This is an inquiry to find out if reports were given about the ww 2 war years when people were being abducted and experimented on.
Cube shaped, hovering in one position aprox. 15- 20 minutes, before slowly heading on a southerly course.

content.detailedDescription: I wasnt exactly there at the scene...But i think this will help.  i was stationed in new jersey, at fort dickson.  i worked the day shift.  one day there were reports of lights in the sky (this is actually on record of ufo sightings)and i was curious.  on my way to my shift the next morning, the radio said that the government said it was a weather balloon.  definate cover-up.  one of my good friends, a big black woman whom i will not reveal her name, who worked the night shift that night, told me that she and another soldier stationed there saw the blue light hover over the fort, and then suddenly desccend to the ground.  it landed on the airstrip!  as soon as it happened the head of the fort said, "thats enough" and pulled them out of there.  they were sent into seperate conceiled rooms and were to fill out papers on what they witnessed, saying that they were never allowed to speak of anything they saw.  that was all she told me before i started my shift.
content.summary: Blue light over fort dickson, new jersy

content.detailedDescription:
I now know it started before but mainly after i moved to the country. just a day or two after i bought the place & started working out there i noticed lights in the night sky that seemed to be moving. a couple nights later i noticed they looked like they were following my truck. now that i know what to look for there are a lot of them. about the time i try to talk myself in to thinking it's a opiticial illusion  something happens to make me know it is happening. they look like brinking stars -- they ones that look most like stars are the closest that seem to follow me the most. they have streaked across the night sky & stopped right in front of the pickup & turn with my every turn. there are also star like ones that you can see are turning different colors. they seem to be farther away but when you look at them with binoculars they are rarely clear / almost blurry but then one night i seen two
much closer than normally & the reason they where never clear to see was they are moving & bouncing around so fast / whipping up & down they apear blurry. i noticed the clear star looking ones first because they would be low in the sky & very bright. i thought if it was'nt a star it was a satilight. my first reactions were i can't be seeing these things & it scared the hell out of me. i have been 100 miles away & as soon as the sun goes down the first thing i notice are these lights. there will almost always be 2 of them to begin with & in a short time you will see a few dozon more. i need someone to tell me what type & kind of camera to buy because most places i have checked the sales people don't know one from another. i have seen these lights for over 2 years now & never said anything to anyone for over a year but now i need to know what this is all about. i feel like i need to distance myself from these things but i don't realy think you can  hide. but i need some proff -- a photo or film but i don't care to play trial & errear game finding a camera that takes night photos. i have a good bussiness & don't want to be thought of as some crack pot but this is something hard to see and not share with someone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I  see  them  every  day  &  night  -  there  are  2-3  different  types  &  where  i  go  they  go.  i  sound  like  such  a  nut  case  but  it's  true.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on my roof dinning with some friends
2. my wife had noticed the same thing at 9:55 am moving to the south west, it was near a airplane flying low so it look very different from it.
3. i  am an amateur astronomer and i am used to watching the sky, this was just like nothing i have seen before, mainly by its speed, and the fact that i see it appear and despair in the middle of the sky, it seemed to me that it was kind of low maybe a 1000 feet.
4. it seemed to have a "body" of some sort of some yellowish color, with a very bright white flashing light, it move in a straight line, faster than anything i've ever seen.
5. i was startled and told my wife and friend about it right away.
6. the object despaired in mid sky as quick as it had appeared, which made it really strange, there are many plane and helicopters flying over, manhattan, so these two could be easily ruled out
content.summary: Extremely fast moving object with bright flashing white light moving to th north from the south

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was in the car with my family going home from my aunts house.
2.It was right on top of my car about 2 feet above.
3.Ufo
4.It was rite on top of our mini van. it was big, had alot of colors, also disapeared in seconds.
5.During i was amazed we were shouting of exite. after we were talkin about it constantly.
6.I told my mom to look and it disapeared
content.summary: Big . colors . close

content.detailedDescription:
From our home, loooking to the northwest, over the horizon, a "flickering" light (not flashing) was in the sky and at times would move...Kind of like watching a kite in the sky react to wind.

we initially thought the light was a tower or a plane, but it moved enough not to be a tower and when it did move, it moved too quickly and directionally to be a plane.

after about 35 minutes, it was no longer there.  i moved from one window to the front porch and back to the window and when i moved back to the window, it had disappeared.  i do not know if it was because clouds moved in fron of it or not....At this point the clouds are still there.
content.summary: Distant light on the horizon

content.detailedDescription: In mid may 1986 i took a ride to rose valley lake appx. 10 miles north of williamsport, pa. an old neighbor friend of mine and i were just killing time until we meet some women friends later. we parked on the north side of the lake facing south and got out and sat on the hood. the sun was just setting to the west dipping just below the mountain. the sky was very clear and we were noticing a smaller commericial jet heading east comming slightly to the south and above us. one of us commented on how clear the jet was visible at that time. while we both we looking at the jet in those few seconds an object appeared to the rear of the jet. we both made comments at the same time. it was something like "do you see that?"!!! or "oh my god". it only took me a few seconds to scan and compare the object to the jet and know i was witnessing something truely remarkabe. now you could not ask for a better visual sighting as the sky was well lit from the sun but blocked from our eyes from the mountain to our right. i watched this ufo follow the jet and slowly get closer to the back of the jet. the jet had a jerky motion to it. the ufo just glided. the jet had exhaust exiting while the ufo nothing. to my best recolection i could hear the jet and nothing from the ufo. i am not a ufo expert. but this ufo was so admormal looking from any aircraft i had ever seen. my best comparison at the time was a music cd in color and shine. it was slightly smaller than the jet but round. it was sleek, no bubble on top like alot of photos i've seen. so anyway, we continue to watch the ufo close in on the jet and suddenly it disapears. i never take my eye off the jet as it moves more to the east of me by this time. suddenly it appears again. but this time it is in front of the jet slightly above it and to the south. it somehow moved to stay in the same position watching the front of the jet. this went on for several seconds or so and then it gave us the grand finally. the ufo moves upward and excellerates more as it goes. it went straight up in the sky until i could not see it anymore. we watched for a good half hour more hoping to see more but that was it. i knew i witnessed something very special that day. i probably would have stayed much longer but my fried bernie williams was getting restless. i grew up watching jets from the mountain right behind the little league world series field in south williamsport. people use to sit on sky line drive for something to do. i lived right next to an air force bace in fort worth texas. i always watched jets passing by. but i never before or after have seen anything like this. i beleived before this, but now i know for sure. i always wanted to report this but didn't really know how. i know those pilots had to have seen it. if they had reported it, i'm sure they could have used my report from the ground. i always felt a little guilty about that.
content.summary: Very clear daylight sighting of ufo following a commercial jet.

content.detailedDescription: On july 28/2005 at ten minutes after seven oclock p.M. my friends little girl was laying on a cement wall that surrounded the lot that we were standing in.She was looking up at the sky when she asked her father what that was up in the sky.We all looked up at the sky and thought there was a bird floating in the sky.The object that we were looking was blinking and started moving in a north easterly direction towards a jet's exhaust trail when all of a sudden another one popped out of the clouds and was blinking just like the other object that was just beneath the clouds to the the northeast of us.The blinking light that emerged from the clouds started moving towards the other blinking light.These lights seemed to have a bluish haze around them visible from the ground.Both blinking lights then flew into the clouds and disappeared from sight.We thought that whatever we had just witnessed had gone and we turned to leave when something shot down from the sky at a phenomenal rate of speed and went behind some trees about two hundred feet from us.The silouette of this object was clearly visible through trees as it came to an unbelievable dead stop behind the trees.The object then began gliding to the right and stopped in an opening in the treeline just above some houses and hovered in frontof my  friend and i and his daughter before emitting an extremely bright light and seemingly vanished in front of our eyes.There are three of us that witnessed this craft come down and will take any lie detector test that you may have.When this craft was hovering in front us everything around seemed to come to a standstill,there was no sound of the busy traffic to the right of us.After it left in a bright flash both my friend and i seemed disoriented.I asked my friend what time it was as we crossed the street and he answered that it was seven fourty eight .Thirty minutes elapsed as we watched this object hover in the air in one of the busiest intersections without seemingly anyone but the three of us noticing this craft that lit eveything up around us ,including us,it seems.I can assure you that as crazy as this sounds it truly occurred ,i have two witnesses willing to undergo any type of validity test you may have.I would willing undergo hypnosis to prove i am telling the truth .This is so bizarre that i can't believe i am taking the chance of being thought of as crazy by reporting this sighting.My friend and his daughter will verify this happening in the city of winnipeg in broad daylight.I have not been feeling the same since this happened,can't quite explain the feelings of anxiety i have been feeling since this happened.Hope this is the first and last time that this ever happens to any of us. any futher questions would preferably be done over the phone.This really happened and i implore that anyone that was in this vicinity on july 28/2005 and witnessed what we did please report it and not  fear the ridicule that i expect until verified through whatever means may exist.My questions are did this craft leave any trace evidence.Can show the exact spot where this thing hovered over rooftops maybe twenty five feet in the air.Was in a clearing between trees .Could there be evidence in the trees that it hovered beside.Am willing to show exactly where this craft hovered.Can also draw photo of what i saw.So can my friend and daughter.
content.summary: A friend of mine ,his daughter and were standing  in a lot on the corner of henderson and hespeler  in winnipeg manitoba and witnessed three ufo's in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
my family & were sitting in our front yard on a very nice summer night last year watching the sky and talking. 
we got on the subject of ufos. my kids (emma 6 & molly 8)
asked me if i had ever seen a ufo. i said no but i'd like too. just then my wife says "like those"? i thought she was just being funny. i looked to the west where she was pointing and just like they where on que,2 ufos. a chill went up my back. in all my life i've never seen anything like these 2 diamond or oval shaped objects with an dark red or orangish glow. they were traveling from the west in a side by side formation end to end. they almost appeared to be linked. very close. they were moving very fast. no sound. it was a very clear night and we could see some airliners and small planes nav lights. this was certainly not one of those. they flew right above us and made 5 or 6 very sharp angular turns, still staying tip to tip, until they were heading north. the whole event was maybe 30 seconds and they were out of sight. i've been a star gaizer and sky watcher for a long time (i'm 50) i've been to air shows, seem lots of meteors (i've even seen one hit the ground in kansas. satellites, comets. i'm an aviation buff so i know things that fly. i've never seen anything like these two things. my wife and kids saw the exact same thing. we were all stunned. we talked about it for days. little variation on our sightings. i thought i saw a darker diamond shape or shadow on the bottom of the objects.
very sincerly
mark sisk
content.summary: 2 reddish diamond or oval shaped objects sighted. traveling from the west make 5 or 6 sharp angular turns and head north at night.

content.detailedDescription:
1.I was fishing on opeepeesway lake
2.Checking the weather/clouds
3.Unknown
4.The object remained stationary.
5.Uncertain of what i was seeing
6.Looked to check the direction of the boat, when i looked back (within a feuw seconds) the object had vanished.
content.summary: Fat cigar shape, the white color similar to that of the white anamal on a washing machine
